DOC.brief_summary: This study first-in-man clinical trial use fiber optically deliver ultraviolet light reduce viable bacteria within indwell tunneled dialysis catheter .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Infected Dialysis Catheters With Fiber Optic Ultraviolet Light
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year age Have ability provide inform consent Have implant dialysis catheter one follow model : Medcomp Titan 15.5F x 24 cm Medcomp Titan 15.5F x 28 cm Positive blood culture drawn catheter Previous inclusion study Pregnant
